0.name: Dimension Reduction Dice
0.desc: When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, **1** extra Blessing(s) can be chosen, but the number of available Blessings will be reduced by **1**. This Curio will be destroyed once this effect has been triggered **2** time(s).

1.name: Chaos Trametes
1.desc: When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, increase the number of free Blessing resets by **1**.

2.name: Warping Compound Eye
2.desc: When choosing Blessings after winning a battle, Enhance all 1-star Blessings that appear.

3.name: Fruit of the Alien Tree
3.desc: After winning a battle, revive all downed characters in the current team and restore their HP to their Max HP. This Curio will be destroyed once this effect has been triggered **1** time(s).

4.name: Casket of Inaccuracy
4.desc: Gains **1**â€“**2** random Blessings after obtaining this Curio.

5.name: Ambergris Cheese
5.desc: After winning a battle, all allies restore HP equal to **30%** of their respective Max HP.

6.name: Fortune Glue
6.desc: When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, all Blessings that appear are guaranteed to be of 3-star rarity. This Curio will be destroyed once this effect has been triggered **1** time(s).

7.name: The Parchment That Always Eats
7.desc: Upon entering battle, all enemies receive a set amount of DMG equal to **30%** of their respective Max HP.

8.name: Broken Cuckoo Clock
8.desc: Upon your next entry into the Simulated Universe, you will get a random 1-star Blessing.

9.name: Mechanical Cuckoo Clock
9.desc: Upon your next entry into the Simulated Universe, you will get a random 2-star Blessing.

10.name: The Doctor's Robe
10.desc: Upon entering battle, regenerates Path Resonance Energy to max and increases Path Resonance DMG by **40%**.

11.name: Society Ticket
11.desc: Increases the number of Cosmic Fragments received after winning a battle by **75%**.

12.name: Faith Bond
12.desc: Reduces the Cosmic Fragments required for Blessing Enhancement, Blessing Reset, and for resetting downed characters by **30%**.

13.name: Robe of The Beauty
13.desc: Upon entering battle, increases DMG dealt by all allies by **16%** for every **100** Cosmic Fragment(s) you own.

14.name: Gold Coin of Discord
14.desc: Upon entering a new domain, gain Cosmic Fragments equal to **6%** of the Cosmic Fragments currently in possession.

16.name: Void Wick Trimmer
16.desc: After obtaining this Curio, randomly repairs up to **2** destroyed Curio(s) and restores their remaining uses to default.

17.name: Omniscient Capsule
17.desc: You can now open your Inventory to use Consumables while in the Simulated Universe. This Curio will be destroyed after **5** Consumables have been used.

18.name: Record from Beyond the Sky
18.desc: Upon entering battle, all allies will nullify all DMG received except for DoT until after they are attacked, and cannot be debuffed for **3** turn(s).

19.name: Entropic Die
19.desc: Randomly Enhances **2** Blessing(s) immediately after obtaining this Curio.

20.name: Shining Trapezohedron Die
20.desc: Replaces all Curios currently in possession (including this Curio) with random Curios.

21.name: Sealing Wax of Preservation
21.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Preservation after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Preservation to appear.

22.name: Sealing Wax of Elation
22.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Elation after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Elation to appear.

23.name: Sealing Wax of The Hunt
23.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of The Hunt after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of The Hunt to appear.

24.name: Sealing Wax of Destruction
24.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Destruction after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Destruction to appear.

25.name: Sealing Wax of Remembrance
25.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Remembrance after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Remembrance to appear.

26.name: Sealing Wax of Nihility
26.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Nihility after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Nihility to appear.

27.name: Sealing Wax of Abundance
27.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Abundance after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Abundance to appear.

28.name: Corrupted Code
28.desc:
Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.
While the code is being fixed, a character loses all their Energy when they Break enemy Weaknesses.
Once the code is fixed, this Curio regenerates characters' Energy.

29.name: Corrupted Code
29.desc: When a character Breaks enemy Weaknesses, they regenerate **40** Energy.

30.name: Odd Code
30.desc:
Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.
While the code is being fixed, a character loses **30%** of their current HP every time they use their Ultimate.
Once the code is fixed, this Curio restores HP for characters.

31.name: Odd Code
31.desc: Every time a character uses their Ultimate, they restore HP equal to **30%** of their Max HP.

32.name: Normal Code
32.desc:
Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.
While the code is being fixed, allies take **35%** more DMG while their HP percentage is below **50%** of their Max HP.
Once the code is fixed, this Curio reduces DMG taken by allies.

33.name: Normal Code
33.desc: Characters receive **25%** less DMG while their HP percentage is below **50%** of their Max HP.

34.name: Elegant Code
34.desc:
Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.
While the code is being fixed, a random enemy's action will be Advanced Forward by **35%** every time a character uses a Skill.
Once the code is fixed, this Curio Advances Forward characters' actions.

35.name: Elegant Code
35.desc: After a character uses a Skill, their next action will be advanced forward by **25%**.

36.name: Mysterious Code
36.desc:
Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.
While the code is being fixed, enemies deal **35%** more DMG when another enemy unit is defeated by a character.
Once the code is fixed, this Curio increases DMG dealt by all allies.

37.name: Mysterious Code
37.desc: All allies deal **25%** more DMG after an enemy is defeated.

38.name: Infinitely Recursive Code
38.desc:
Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.
While the code is being fixed, each time after a character uses a Skill, they consume **1** extra Skill Points.
Once the code is fixed, this Curio makes characters' Basic ATK recover extra Skill Points.

39.name: Infinitely Recursive Code
39.desc: Recovers **1** extra Skill Point(s) when characters use Basic ATK.

40.name: Shattered Star Bait
40.desc: Increase Movement SPD by **20%** when in map. During combat, characters' actions are Advanced Forward by **10%** after they take action.

41.name: Obliteration Wick Trimmer
41.desc: Upon entering battle, increase all allies' DMG by **3%** for every destructible object that has been destroyed.

42.name: Insect Web
42.desc: Upon entering battle, the character currently with the highest ATK will become Parasitized. While Parasitized, the character's ATK increases by **50%**, but will lose HP equal to **20%** of their current HP at the start of every turn. When this character is knocked down, Parasitized will be transferred to a random character.

43.name: Angel-type I.O.U. Dispenser
43.desc: Cosmic Fragments are not received upon winning battles. After triggering this effect **5** times, this Curio will be destroyed and the amount of Cosmic Fragment(s) currently held will be doubled.

44.name: Laurel Crown of Planar Shifts
44.desc: The current exploration will not terminate if your team is defeated in battle outside of a final domain. Instead, the battle will be considered as a victory, and all characters will recover HP up to their respective Max HP. After triggering this effect **1** time(s), this Curio will be destroyed.

45.name: Space-Time Prism
45.desc: Upon entering battle, increase all ally's Eidolon Resonance level by **1**.

46.name: Cosmic Big Lotto
46.desc: After destroying destructible objects, there is a small chance of receiving 1 Curio, but also a small chance of destroying this Curio and all characters losing **99%** of their current HP.

47.name: Omniscient Capsule
47.desc: Destructible objects will appear more frequently and rewards obtained from them are doubled.

48.name: Divination Cuckoo Clock
48.desc: When selecting Blessings after victory, the number of available Blessings will be reduced by **1**.

49.name: Black Forest Cuckoo Clock
49.desc: Upon entering battle, randomly increases the chance for **1** character(s) to be attacked by enemies for **5** turn(s).

50.name: Perpetual Motion Cuckoo Clock
50.desc: Upon entering a new domain, lose **5%** of all Cosmic Fragment(s) currently in possession.

51.name: Punklorde Mentality
51.desc: Upon entering battle, there is a **100%** fixed chance to add to all enemies **1** Weakness(es) of the same Type(s) as allies currently on the field. These Weakness(es) last(s) for **3** turn(s).

52.name: Beacon Coloring Paste
52.desc: When choosing a Blessing after winning a battle, randomly Enhance **1** Blessing(s) among the selection.

53.name: IPC Cuckoo Clock
53.desc: Increases Cosmic Fragments required to Enhance and reset Blessings by **25%**.

54.name: Mechanical Cuckoo Clock
54.desc: Upon entering battle, consume **2** Skill Point.

55.name: Triangular Drum-roll Device
55.desc: When choosing Paths for the first and second planes, you can additionally select **1** already Enhanced Blessing(s) for the corresponding Paths.

56.name: Silver Coin of Discord
56.desc: Immediately gain Cosmic Fragments equal to **50%** of the Cosmic Fragments currently in possession.

57.name: Broken Cuckoo Clock
57.desc: Additionally consume a certain amount of Cosmic Fragments while you have the IPC Cuckoo Clock to obtain this Curio and immediately obtain **999** Cosmic Fragment(s).

58.name: Family Ties
58.desc: Increase all allies' DMG by **30%** for every Curio that has been destroyed.

59.name: Medal of the Gloryblood Era
59.desc: Immediately gain **1** random 3-star Blessing(s). The next time you enter an Occurrence domain, no Occurrence will be triggered. This Curio will be destroyed after the effect is triggered **1** time(s).

60.name: Black Hole Trap
60.desc: You will obtain **10** Cosmic Fragments for each ally whose HP is at max when winning a battle.

61.name: Interastral Big Lotto
61.desc: After destroying destructible objects, there is a small chance of receiving 1 random Blessing, but also a small chance of destroying this Curio and causing all team members to lose all Energy and Technique Points.

62.name: Fissured Cuckoo Clock
62.desc: Reduces characters' ATK by **5%** and grants a chance of splitting into a clone (with a max of **3** concurrent clones) after winning a battle.

64.name: Typical Genius Society Gossip
64.desc: After obtaining this Curio, Cosmic Fragments obtained will increase by **100%**, but Blessings will no longer be obtained after combat.

65.name: Tonic of Efficacious Chaos
65.desc: Increases DMG dealt by characters' Techniques by **200%**. Technique DMG further increases by **200%** of the Technique's respective character's Max HP.

66.name: Rubert Empire Mechanical Cogwheel
66.desc: You obtain **50** Cosmic Fragments each time you enter a domain. If the Cosmic Fragment total exceeds **500**, then the Curio will be destroyed and all Cosmic Fragments will be lost.

67.name: Cavity System Model
67.desc: Lose all currently possessed Cosmic Fragments. For every **100** Cosmic Fragments lost in this way, increases all characters' CRIT DMG by **24%**.

68.name: Tousled Detective
68.desc: When entering Combat: Swarm, Occurrence: Swarm, and Boss: Swarm domains, increases characters' DMG dealt by **8%** in the above domains.

69.name: Fool's Mask
69.desc: All Blessings in possession are swapped to random Blessings with their Enhancement levels retained, with a chance of being replaced by Blessings of higher rarity.

70.name: Vile Mechanical Satellite 900
70.desc: Reduces the prices for shop items in Transaction Domains by **30%**

71.name: Spirit of the Knights of Beauty
71.desc: Gains **4** dice reroll(s) after obtaining this Curio.

72.name: Illusory Automaton
72.desc: At the start of a character's turn, they restore HP equal to **20%** of their Max HP.

73.name: A Pinch of Bearded Gunpowder
73.desc: Gains **1** cheat attempt(s) after obtaining this Curio.

74.name: Man-Made Meteorite
74.desc: Gains **1**â€“**3** random Blessings for the current Path after obtaining this Curio.

75.name: Thalan Toxi-Flame
75.desc: Upon entering battle, the character with the highest ATK consumes HP equal to **24%** of their Max HP at the start of each turn. At the same time, their SPD increases by **5%**, up to **5** times.

76.name: The Pinkest Collision
76.desc: Upon entering battle, all allies' Break Effect increases by **20%** for every Blessing of a different Path possessed.

77.name: Sealing Wax of Propagation
77.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Propagation after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is an increased chance for Blessings of Propagation to appear.

78.name: Society Ticket (Infinite)
78.desc: The number of Cosmic Fragments received after winning a battle increases by **150%**

79.name: Faith Bond (Infinite)
79.desc: The Cosmic Fragments required for Blessing Enhancement, Blessing Reset, and for resetting downed characters is reduced by **50%**

80.name: Gold Coin of Discord (Infinite)
80.desc: Upon entering a new domain, gain Cosmic Fragments equal to **12%** of the Cosmic Fragments currently in possession.

81.name: Entropic Die (Infinite)
81.desc: Randomly Enhances **5** Blessing(s) immediately after obtaining this Curio.

82.name: Obliteration Wick Trimmer (Infinite)
82.desc: Upon entering battle, all characters' DMG increase by **5%** for every destructible object that has been destroyed.

83.name: Cosmic Big Lotto (Infinite)
83.desc: This Cosmic Big Lotto will not be destroyed. After smashing destructible objects, there is a high chance of obtaining 1 Curio, but there is also a small chance that all allies will lose **50%** of their current HP and gain **50** Cosmic Fragment(s).

84.name: Omniscient Capsule (Infinite)
84.desc: On top of the original effect of the Omniscient Capsule, further increases the chance of destructible objects appearing and doubles the rewards for destroying them.

85.name: Punklorde Mentality (Infinite)
85.desc: Upon entering battle, there is a **100%** fixed chance to apply all Weakness(es) of the same Type(s) as characters currently on the field to all enemies. These Weakness(es) last(s) for **5** turn(s).

86.name: Robe of The Beauty (Infinite)
86.desc: When entering battle, increases all characters' DMG by **8%** for every **100** Cosmic Fragments that has been obtained in this run (including those that have already been spent)

87.name: Angel-type I.O.U. Dispenser (Infinite)
87.desc: Cosmic Fragments are not received upon winning battles. After triggering this effect **3** time(s), this Curio will be destroyed and you will receive Cosmic Fragments equal to **70%** of the Cosmic Fragment(s) you currently possess.

88.name: Shattered Star Bait (Infinite)
88.desc: Increase Movement SPD by **20%** when on the map. During combat, characters' actions are Advanced Forward by **10%** after they take action. When you capture a Trotter, you can additionally gain a Blessing 1 more time

89.name: Wish Upon a Star
89.desc: Bringing this Curio into an Adventure Domain will cause the domain's time limit to be increased by **50%**. You will also get an additional chest upon entering this domain. This Curio will be destroyed after the effect has been triggered **2** times

90.name: Price of Peace
90.desc: Receives **150** Cosmic Fragments when entering a Transaction Domain.

91.name: "Jellyfish on the Staircase"
91.desc: Loses all Dice reroll attempts. Making a reroll will no longer consume a reroll attempt. If the same Dice Face is rolled more than once in a single turn, this Curio will be destroyed.

92.name: Rationality's Fall
92.desc: Possessing this Curio is considered the equivalent of possessing **1** Blessing(s) of each Path.

93.name: Indecipherable Box
93.desc: After resetting Blessings, at least 1 Blessing from the current Path will appear. This Curio will be destroyed after its effect has been triggered **3** times

94.name: Rotting Fruit of the Alien Tree
94.desc: Characters will resist all effects that cause them to be inflicted with Crowd Control debuffs. Every time they resist a debuff, they will consume HP equal to **20%** of their Max HP

95.name: King of Sponges
95.desc: Every time you enter a domain, all allies will lose **80%** of their current HP, while their Max HP are increased by **10%**. This Curio will be destroyed after its effect has been triggered **4** times, and the Max HP bonus will take effect even after the Curio is destroyed.

96.name: Mysterious Magnetism
96.desc: After entering a Combat Domain, its content will be immediately replaced with that of an Elite Domain. After entering a Combat Domain or Elite Domain **2** time(s), this Curio will be destroyed and grant **200** Cosmic Fragments.

97.name: "Organic Heart"
97.desc: The golden Dice Face will not appear when rolling the dice. After rolling the dice **4** times, this Curio will be destroyed and grant **2** cheat attempt(s).

98.name: A-Ruan Pouch
98.desc: Immediately obtains **3** random Blessings. After winning a battle, the selectable number of Blessings becomes 1. This Curio will be destroyed after **2** battles

99.name: Sealing Wax of Erudition
99.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Erudition after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Erudition to appear.

100.name: "Cognito Invalidater" Codebuilder
100.desc: When entering battle, characters lose Energy equal to their Max Energy

101.name: "Cognito Averagifier" Communal Nexus
101.desc: Increases the prices for shop items in Transaction Domains by **25%**

102.name: "Ashheart" Ciphertech
102.desc: Possessing this Curio is considered the equivalent of losing **1** Blessing(s) of each Path

103.name: "Revelrous" Rainbowmaker
103.desc: Bringing this Curio into an Adventure Domain will decrease the domain's time limit by **30%**

104.name: "Wildminder" Machine Cell
104.desc: Additionally consumes **1** Technique Points when characters use their Technique
